body:
GE Grid Solutions is looking for a  C++ Software Development Engineer to join our team in Bucharest!

Project context:

Electricity markets – critical IT systems – trading platform – near real-time applications.

If you enjoy challenging though problems, delivering thoughtful solutions and learning every single day, you may be a good candidate to join our team.

Main job responsibilities: 

- Handle design and implementation of SCADA/EMS sub-systems involving Alstom hierarchical e-terrahabitat database. Mainly the development will be in C/C++. Depending on the customer project, some requirements could involve C# or Java Development.
- Perform software modules upgrades to newer software versions. This mainly includes code porting from Fortran to C++. 
- Participate in testing sessions with the client during project milestones (demos, FAT, SAT.etc).
- Participate in the process improvement and documentation update efforts.

Desired Skills and Experience

Main requirements:
• Post Graduate Degree in software engineering, computer science, or equivalent work experience.
• Strong programming skills in writing code in C, C++, Java, .Net. 
• Proven understanding of software design and development methodology.
• At least 3 years of experience in software design, development and testing.
• Knowledge of SCADA system behavior and operation is appreciated.
• Good communication in English (both written and spoken).
title: C++ Software Development Engineer
locations: Bulevardul Dimitrie Cantemir Nr.1, București, Municipiul București, România
